name.en: Corporate Banking Practice, Exercise and the application of BIG DATA
name.ch: 企業金融實務、演練與大數據之相關應用

goal.en: The program is designed to deliver the ideas of what is corporate banking and how it works through basic industrial knowledge sharing and case study. Role playing and group discussion are the core of this program which could bring the student into the real work environment then realize soft skill matters. In addition to abovementioned, the application of BIG DATA in Corporate banking is the field we want to cover to bring the concept to students in this course.

content.en:
1 -2 Introduction of Banking Industry and Corporate Banking
3 -10 What is credit and how to do credit analysis plus real case study:
People, purpose, protection, payment, perspective
1. Group discussion and presentation: People and Payment
2. Write up a Credit Analysis
11-12 1. Non Performing loan recovery and credit rating
2. Introduction of Trade Finance
13-23 BIG DATA in Corporate banking:
1. 大數據與FinTech於金融業應用介紹
2. 如何成為大數據潮流下所需的人才
3. Python程式介紹與基礎語法
4. 網路爬蟲與資料爬取實作練習
5. 大數據於企業金融實務應用(一) -信用審查因子分析為例
6. 大數據於企業金融實務應用(二) -信用審查因子分析為例
7. 大數據於企業金融實務應用(三) -信用審查因子分析為例
8. 輿情分析專題演講
24-29 Learning by doing: an opportunity to interview corporate senior management.
30 Evaluation of Relationship Manager and the model
